title: Tanita Tikaram - Ancient Heart (1988) FLAC[24Bit 96KHz Vinyl]
description:
Tanita Tikaram (born 12 August 1969) is a British pop/folk singer-songwriter, best known for the hits "Twist in My Sobriety" 
and "Good Tradition" from her 1988 debut album, Ancient Heart.
Ancient Heart is the debut album by Tanita Tikaram. The record was released by Warner Music Groupon September 13, 1988. 
The album had huge success and was a hit globally, launching Tanita's mainstream career. Guest musicians included Rod 
Mark Isham, Peter Van Hooke, Paul Brady, and Brendan Croker. Argent and Van Hooke produced the album. The record includes four
 singles.
